law.text: At the time of appointment of a fiduciary, he may designate an attorney who will represent him in matters relating to the trust, and when so designated notices to such fiduciary shall also be sent by the court to such attorney.
law.history: Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 268. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 167, sec. 4.
